title: Of primary importance: a diary of change for equality
creator_credit: Bob Scarfe, Andrea C. Allard, Anne Davies and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: A primary school teacher becomes aware of the sexism which surrounds her school, and with the other teachers and parents attempts to change the school’s policy
